text: Coronavirus hit mostly blue states first. It made Trump’s base even more gullible, combative & vulnerable. Propaganda is flowing & he will cannibalize them to re-open early. It’s a good bet his supporters will now die at 2 to 1 ratio over ppl who follow safety & social distancing
